cards.title: The Goalie
powers: {TheGoalieCharacter} deals 1 target 0 melee damage and another target 1 projectile damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: Select a target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that target by 2.
Select a target. Increase the next damage dealt by that target by 2.
The 2 hero targets with the lowest HP regain 1 HP each.

cards.title: 18-Yard Box
body: When this card enters play, move it to a play area with no other Goalposts cards. You may play a Goalposts card from your trash. Then, destroy all but 2 Goalposts cards.
When damage would be dealt to or by {TheGoalieCharacter} to or by a target in this play area, you may increase or reduce that damage by 1.

cards.title: Place of Power
body: When this card enters play, you may play a card named [i]18-Yard Box[/i] from your trash. Then, destroy all but 2 Goalposts cards.
Reduce the first damage dealt to {TheGoalieCharacter} each turn by 1. Increase the first damage dealt by {TheGoalieCharacter} each turn by 1.

cards.title: Overcrowding
body: Whenever a Goalposts card enters play, it becomes indestructible until the end of the turn and you may play a Goalposts card from your trash.
powers: {TheGoalieCharacter} deals up to 2 targets 2 melee damage each. If there are 3 or more Goalposts cards in play, return this card to your hand.

cards.title: Twelfth Girl
body: Once per turn, when a hero target would be dealt exactly 1 damage, you may prevent that damage.
When damage is prevented this way, up to X hero targets each regain 1 HP, where X = 2 times the number of Goalposts cards in hero play areas.

cards.title: Return to Sender
body: The first time {TheGoalieCharacter} is dealt damage by a target each turn, {TheGoalieCharacter} may deal that target 1 melee damage.
powers: Draw a card. Increase the next damage dealt by {TheGoalieCharacter} by 2.

cards.title: Park the Bus
body: Redirect all damage that would be dealt to hero targets to {TheGoalieCharacter}.
Reduce damage dealt to {TheGoalieCharacter} by 1.
At the start of your turn, discard 3 cards or destroy this card.

cards.title: Starting Whistle
body: Search your deck for a Goalposts card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
You may play a Goalposts card or draw 2 cards.
{TheGoalieCharacter} deals 1 target 1 melee damage.

cards.title: Move the Goalposts
body: Search your deck for a Goalposts card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
You may destroy one of your Ongoing cards. If you do, you may play an Ongoing card.

cards.title: Huddle Up!
body: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put 1 into your hand and the rest into your trash.
You may play a card.

cards.title: Hospital Ball
body: {TheGoalieCharacter} deals 1 target 4 projectile damage.
The next damage dealt to {TheGoalieCharacter} by a non-hero target is irreducible.

cards.title: Offsides!
body: {TheGoalieCharacter} deals 1 target 2 melee damage.
If that target is in a play area with a Goalposts card, {TheGoalieCharacter} deals another target in that play area 2 irreducible projectile damage.

cards.title: Out of Bounds
body: Destroy all Goalposts cards in your play area.
Draw 3 cards.

cards.title: Extra Time
body: Shuffle your trash into your deck.
{TheGoalieCharacter} regains 4 HP.
Draw a card.
Immediately end your turn.

cards.title: Shootout
body: {TheGoalieCharacter} deals each non-hero target 2 projectile damage. Destroy a Goalposts card in a non-hero play area.

cards.title: Team Spirit
body: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.
Each hero target regains 1 HP.
